attributes.action: Successfully lobby UK Medal Office to backdate the eligibility period to 2016
attributes.additional_details: Amend the eligibility date from 11 Dec 18 & back date to the beginning in Op CABRIT.
attributes.background: Service Personnel on Op CABRIT 3 & those on CABRIT 1 & 2 deployed to Estonia & Poland before 10th December 2018 & before have had overseas deployment completely disregarded.  Commencement of the eligibility date from 11 Dec 18 is grossly unfair & ignores UK service to NATO from 2016.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand that you are concerned about the eligibility for a medal, but we're not sure for which medal you would like to see the eligibility criteria changed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
